author: heather || ia
text: I hope we can have a good relationship with other fandoms where we respect each other and be happy with each other's achievements. If there's any misunderstanding let's avoid toxicity everything can be resolve with a peaceful and respectful communication. +

author: heather || ia
text: comparing their achievements to ours which always leads to toxicity and misunderstanding resulting to fanwars. Every group has it's own uniqueness and identities, every group is incomparable bcs they are all talented and worked hard to achive their dreams. +

author: heather || ia
text: I hope that every aeons will always remember that it is not that important to surpass other fandom or idol's achievements. We have our own goals and records we need to set and eventually will aim to surpass, I think in that way we can see our growth as a fandom better than +

author: heather || ia
text: A simple respect to each other fans to fans, fans to idols gives big impact to the both fandom.
